main event: A person in Los Gatos, California reported seeing a white and red, bowl-shaped object in the sky on June 6, 1957 around 11 PM.
interesting points: The object had a pulsating red light that would get brighter for 15 seconds then dim for 15 seconds, but never went out.
The object was seen at an elevation of approximately 45 degrees and was between 500-1000 feet in altitude.
The object flew towards the earth fairly slowly and disappeared behind a house after being observed for about 1.5 minutes.
The witness took 3 photographs of the object which they offered to provide.
The Air Force responded that the information provided was insufficient for a definitive evaluation.
sighted object: A white and red, bowl-shaped object
